title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 28 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 28 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: Unto thee will I cry, O LORD my rock; be not silent to me: lest, if thou be silent to me, I become like them that go down into the pit.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，我要求告你。我的磐石阿，不要向我缄默。倘若你向我闭口，我就如将死的人一样。

lineList.en: Hear the voice of my supplications, when I cry unto thee, when I lift up my hands toward thy holy oracle.
lineList.cn: 我呼求你，向你至圣所举手的时候，求你垂听我恳求的声音。

lineList.en: Draw me not away with the wicked, and with the workers of iniquity, which speak peace to their neighbours, but mischief is in their hearts.
lineList.cn: 不要把我和恶人，并作孽的，一同除掉。他们与邻舍说和平话，心里却是奸恶。

lineList.en: Give them according to their deeds, and according to the wickedness of their endeavours: give them after the work of their hands; render to them their desert.
lineList.cn: 愿你按着他们所作的，并他们所行的恶事待他们。愿你照着他们手所作的待他们。将他们所应得的报应加给他们。

lineList.en: Because they regard not the works of the LORD, nor the operation of his hands, he shall destroy them, and not build them up.
lineList.cn: 他们既然不留心耶和华所行的，和他手所作的，他就必毁坏他们，不建立他们。

lineList.en: Blessed be the LORD, because he hath heard the voice of my supplications.
lineList.cn: 耶和华是应当称颂的，因为他听了我恳求的声音。

lineList.en: The LORD is my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped: therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; and with my song will I praise him.
lineList.cn: 耶和华是我的力量，是我的盾牌。我心里倚靠他，就得帮助。所以我心中欢乐。我必用诗歌颂赞他。

lineList.en: The LORD is their strength, and he is the saving strength of his anointed.
lineList.cn: 耶和华是他百姓的力量，又是他受膏者得救的保障。

lineList.en: Save thy people, and bless thine inheritance: feed them also, and lift them up for ever.
lineList.cn: 求你拯救你的百姓，赐福给你的产业，牧养他们，扶持他们，直到永远。
